RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: POLA OF TROUBLE went evenly through the turn firing in mid stretch moving in tandem abreast a very game rival getting a nose down on the wire. TALLY'S RIVER slow early surged into upper stretch locking up on the inside of a rival matching strides to the wire just missing in a very game effort. BAYTOWN ANGEL pressed the pace shaking clear on the turn holding a solid margin in upper stretch faltering late under outside pressure. RENT FREE pressed early ceding on the turn weakening in upper stretch. MACI'S WORLD played no factor. LUNA SOL was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Rent Free
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, ceded on turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Maci's World
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Tally's River
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, surged into lane, dueled inside of foe late, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Sol
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Baytown Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, shook clear turn, dug in lane, faltered,

ENTRY.NAME: Pola of Trouble
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, fired mid stretch, abreast rival last sixtreenth, just up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 10 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UCAPTURED AERO sent clear set the pace carrying daylight throughout holding firm to wire. SECRET SEDUCTION rallied on the turn chasing willingly through the lane. CONSTITUTIONALIST chased through the turn weakening in upper stretch. TIPHARAH played no factor. LOVE GONE WILD faded on the turn. QUITCHERSNIVELIN trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Tipharah
ENTRY.OWNER: Hallman Suanne and Lusk Brian Richard
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Quitchersnivelin
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Constitutionalist
ENTRY.OWNER: Siesta Thoroughbred Racing Rossi Gregg and Toporcer Greg
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Love Gone Wild
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Ucaptured Aero
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, dug in lane, held firm

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Carol A. Reitman, Susan Gannon & WarrenMiller

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Seduction
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied on the turn, chased willingly to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 10 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: W H LITTLE MISS GO bid three deep at the quarter pole then dueled abreast rival down the lane winning out in the end. BOUJEE KITTEN pressed the pace dueling along the inside through the turn then down the lane ceding grudgingly at the end. MOMMY BERTA pressed the pace moving between horses on the turn weakening in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: W H Little Miss Go
ENTRY.COMMENT: bid three deep 1/4 pole, dueled abreast lane, won out

ENTRY.NAME: Boujee Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside turn, dueled rail lane, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Mommy Berta
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 83. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MT. ZEROR checked leaving the gate saving ground after rallying into upper stretch edging clear late from the rail. DUST STORM pressed the pace wresting the lead on the turn digging in down the lane ceding late to inside pressure. FAR FROM HOME pressured the pace looming into upper stretch extending three deep weakening the final eighth. KNOCKOUT GUY slow early raced evenly to upper stretch moving up on the inside. MO TOWN BLUES raced mid pack weakening in upper stretch. FINAL VERDICT pressed the pace through the turn fading in upper stretch. COMMISSIONER H was never involved. SOUTHPOINT was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Mt. Zeror
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked break, saved ground, rallied into lane, clear on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Commissioner H
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Far From Home
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, loomed into lane, weakened three deep

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Town Blues
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack. weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Knockout Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, evenly to lane, moved up late

ENTRY.NAME: Southpoint
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Final Verdict
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Dust Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led turn, dug in lane, ceded to inside pressure

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 14200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 10 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIO MARIA pressed on a narrow lead through the turn dug in under heavy pressure the final sixteenth responding gamely on the inside to prevail. LOVE MY CHERYL surged to pressure on the turn extending down the lane matching strides the final sixteenth abreast foe battling to the end. TESTED POSITIVE slow early played no factor. POLISHED GEM pressed early then faded on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Gio Maria
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on pace, dug in through the lane, held on gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Polished Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Tested Positive
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Love My Cheryl
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged up on turn, dueled abreast down the lane, battled to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 8500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE OCTOBER 10, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 10 Allowed 3 lbs . Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STARSHIP NUGGET spotted the field by the missing the break, gained on the backside bidding boldly three deep on the far turn drawing away down the lane as clearly much the best. LA BRODY gave a prompted middle move chasing on the far turn splitting horses in upper stretch getting up for place. AND I KNOW prompted the pace extending through the far turn ceding into upper stretch staying on late for minors. MALIBU MARLEE tracked the pace chasing on the far turn fading in upper stretch regrouping to vie for minors late four wide. HERO'S DAUGHTER set a pressured pace through the far turn ceding in upper stretch tiring late. RUNAWAY MOM was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Hero's Daughter
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Nugget
ENTRY.COMMENT: missed the break, advanced backside, bid three deepturn drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: La Brody
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, chased turn, split horses top lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: And I Know
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, extended far turn, no match lane, stayed on

ENTRY.NAME: Runaway Mom
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu Marlee
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, chased to lane, dropped off, finished evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 93. Claiming Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 10 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $8,500 Or Less Not Considered).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INDIAN GULCH tracked the pace rallying into upper stretch wresting the lead abreast rival in mid stretch edging clear under a drive. APPRAISAL pressed the pace shaking clear on the far turn being hooked from the outside in upper stretch ceding grudgingly late. STRIKE THE TOP gained on the backside chasing through the far turn weakening in upper stretch finishing evenly on the inside. SAVVY LAYLA unhurried early put in a mild bid on the far turn then leveled off in upper stretch. HEZA HANDFUL stalked the pace chasing on the far turn fading in upper stretch. MARSALA MONARCH pressed the early pace then wilted abruptly on the far turn.

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, wilted

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased far turn, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 10 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SANTIAGO'S CAT set the pace saving ground widening in upper stretch hanging on late along the inside. MYSTIC MINISTER went evenly through the turn extending inside down the lane finding a late surge to press in the final yards. JOHN'S KID slow early angled out in upper stretch coming on late at mid track. HUNTER JUMPER faded on turn, racing inside to upper stretch gaining late. ANGELUS DIAMOND slow early circled out to upper stretch bidding late six wide. RESVALON a step slow to upper stretch vied belatedly in the four path. OLD FORTY FIVE slow early failed to menace. IN THE GOSPEL pressed early then tired in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: John's Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, angled out lane, came on late mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Santiago's Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, saved ground to lane, dug in late, held on

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Resvalon
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, lagged to lane,, vied belatedly four path

ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, no menace

ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, circled out to upper stretch, late bid 6 wide,
